title: Turkey and butternut squash noodle soup
ingredients: ['1.5L low salt chicken stock', '3 celery stalks, chopped', '1/2 onion, chopped', '1 teaspoon chopped garlic', '3/4 teaspoon oregano', '1/4 teaspoon ground chipotle chilli pepper, or to taste', '3/4 butternut squash, peeled and sliced into spirals', '275g diced cooked turkey', '1 teaspoon freshly chopped coriander, or more to taste']
